tool_description: Audits the operational status, maintenance records, and calibration compliance of food service equipment to ensure proper functioning and regulatory compliance.

maintenance_threshold_days.description: Number of days before maintenance is considered overdue

calibration_threshold_days.description: Number of days before calibration is considered overdue

include_warranty_status.description: Include warranty status in the audit

error_messages: Empty equipment list: Provide at least one equipment item to audit.
Invalid threshold values: maintenance_threshold_days and calibration_threshold_days must be positive integers.
Equipment access error: Unable to access maintenance records for one or more equipment items.
Data inconsistency: Conflicting information found in equipment records.
usage: Provide equipment_list array and optionally set maintenance_threshold_days, calibration_threshold_days, and include_warranty_status. The tool returns comprehensive equipment status information with compliance indicators.

audit_summary.description: Overall summary of equipment audit results

compliant_equipment_count.description: Number of equipment items in full compliance

maintenance_overdue.description: List of equipment with overdue maintenance

calibration_overdue.description: List of equipment with overdue calibration

operational_status.description: Current operational status of each equipment item
